name: Squirrel Day Quest (v0.7)
description:
Squirrel Day is a VR Squirrel game about climbing, exploring, and collecting. Use your paws to crawl, jump, and grab to travel around the tree branches and collect the nuts as fast as possible. **This is a VR game that must be sideloaded onto a Meta/Oculus Quest 2 or Quest Pro**.

-- Physics-based movement system. Move your hands to move your body. Push off of any surface to move in the opposite direction. (Gorilla Tag style movement)

-- Use the index triggers to grab any surface.

-- Arrow indicator on watch will point to nearest nut.

-- Timer starts when first nut is collected and stops on contact with last nut.

ATTENTION! This is an alpha build. It's a little ugly, has some lighting and collision bugs, and the trampolines are janky, but it is fun to play and I wanted to get this early version out while I optimize art and finish up the final level designs. Hope you enjoy it! Must be sideloaded to headset. Email granitetopgames@gmail dot com with any feedback or issues. Thanks!
